b'Energy stocks are hot and jumping up 100\xe2\x80\x99s of percent. $useg US Energy. $18 yr high at $3.80. $snde $22 yr high at $1.85. Hot sector @TopStockAlerts1'
b'Reversal plays! $AYTU still with a gap to fill. $ADTX and $ENTX is beginning to ramp up. 4 reversals still bottomed out: $SONN $SNDE $MKD $LMNL.'
b'@BdeGlobal With the sector moving and new runners starting up in afterhours, what do you think about $SNDE . Sundance energy. Wondering if that will be a mover next week?'
b'@saadvisory I see $SNDE as a 10x bet on oil and natural gas ... and the bankers get paid ... if oil recovers high enough.'

b'@saadvisory $SNDE reviewed 10Q.  Their oil, NatGas, & NGL prices & production down in Q3/20 vs. Q3/19.

Eagle Ford Shale field requires spending & expertise to regain production.

$380.5M in book value in their oil & gas properties, at lower oil prices.'

b'@HRobH $SNDE seems like a play on the Eagle Ford Shale Play, Western Gulf Basin, South Texas.  

$SNDE has both kinds of production, oil and gas (but mostly oil).

Eagle Ford Shale Maps: https://t.co/lqGKIhjuHD

Eagle Ford Shale Operators:  https://t.co/r7TVmMRv5c'
b'$SNDE  It sure looks like snde is headed to BK  see the 8k filed yesterday.  It would make you want to run to the exits fasssst'
b'Zero shares available to short currently in $SNDE.\nhttps://t.co/1syDhpqAQY'
